allQuestion.explanation: Find out if a man in your life is worthy of your kindness, or could use a piece of your mind!

answers.text: Yes, he tries to live up to his promises.
He says a lot of things but then does something entirely different.
He is mostly talk and little action.
He means well, but can't always do what he says he will.

allQuestion.text: Does what he says and what he does match up?

allQuestion.explanation: Find out if a man in your life is worthy of your kindness, or could use a piece of your mind!

answers.text: Yes, he's so hot and cold!
Yes, but he's just being situation-appropriate.
No - and I wish he'd have more manners and try!

allQuestion.text: Does he treat you different around different people and situations?

allQuestion.explanation: Find out if a man in your life is worthy of your kindness, or could use a piece of your mind!
allQuestion.text: What emotion does he make you feel toward him most often?
